name: Project Boost (Jay Peterson)
description:
Project Boost Controls:
  • Space - Main Thrust
  • A - Rotate Counter-Clockwise
  • D - Rotate Clockwise
Objective:
  • Play through 8 levels without crashing your ship
  • Red obstacles will cause you to crash
  • Each level is can be completed by navigating your ship to the green landing pad
Notes:
  • Debug Keys:
    • C - Toggle Collisions On/Off
    • L - Load Next Level
  • Completing level 8 will bring you back to level 1.
  • Sounds and particle effect prefabs provided by:
    • https://www.udemy.com/share/1000PKAEEddlpXQno=/
